original_text: And all the people of the land rejoiced, and the city was in quiet: and they slew Athaliah with the sword beside the king's house.
korean_text: 온 백성이 즐거워하고 온 성이 평온하더라 아달랴를 무리가 왕궁에서 칼로 죽였더라

sentences.original_text: And all the people of the land rejoiced
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 땅의 모든 백성이 기뻐하였다

sentences.original_text: and the city was in quiet
and they slew Athaliah with the sword
